    A simple model of a borg. borg age, move, assimilate, and die.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Borg

        public Borg(boolean randomAge,
            Field field,
            Location location)
        Create a Borg. A Borg can be created as a new born (age zero and not hungry) or with a random age and energy level.
        Parameters:
        randomAge - If true, the fox will have random age and hunger level.
        field - The field currently occupied.
        location - The location within the field.

      • act

        public void act(java.util.List<Actor> newBorg)
        This is what the Borg does most of the time: it hunts for rabbits. In the process, it might assimilate, die of hunger, or die of old age.
        Specified by:
        act in interface Actor
        Specified by:
        act in class Animal
        Parameters:
        field - The field currently occupied.
        newBorg - A list to return newly assimilated Borg.
